overview: Once upon a time, several young men found their way into an old beautiful mansion, where they found a book called "The Scent of Youth." While they read it, a ghost of a young man appears, and from that moment sex starts pouring like an open Hoover Dam!
tagline: An eerie & tender Ghost Story from Triumvirate "The Scent of Youth" that features George Steel and the last performance by Lukas Wink (Jeff Daniels) before departing for Bel Ami.
title: Der Duft der Knaben
